name: The Offer
description:
"I wanted to meet you because there's something we need to talk about." Sit down and have a little chat with Raleigh, a tankhead. There's something he needs to tell you...

I made this in a day to test out the Ren'PyWeb port. I thought it would be a neat way to share my verse's lore with people, as opposed to a wall of descriptive text.

If you enjoyed this, why not check out my website for more tank people stuff?
